verses.roman:
nārāyaṇera cihna-yukta śrī-hasta caraṇa
ei śiśu sarva loke karibe tāraṇa

synonyms: nārāyaṇera—of Lord Nārāyaṇa; cihna-yukta—with positive marks; śrī-hasta caraṇa—the palm and the sole; ei—this; śiśu—baby; sarva loke—all the three worlds; karibe—will; tāraṇa—deliver.
translation: "This baby has all the symptoms of Lord Nārāyaṇa on His palms and soles. He will be able to deliver all the three worlds.
